question: You have just moved into a new home and are planning to hold a party. You are worried that the noise may disturb your neighbour.Write a letter to your neighbour. In your letterintroduce yourselfdescribe your plans for the partyinvite your neighbor to come
text: Hope my letter finds you well.

I am Jenny Cornejo, one of your neighbours here in Greenhills. I am recently moved from Cagayan province. I am writing this letter to let you know that I am planning to conduct a birthday party in my new home.

The schedule of the event will be this coming Saturday, from 7 to 10 in the evening. We will be doing a lot of activities such as parlour games, karaoke, and others. Thus, I am worried that such stuff may disturb you and your family. Let me know if the time of the party is fine with you. If not, I am willing to change it at an early time.
Furthermore, I would like to use this opportunity to invite your family. I believe this is the best time to know me and vice versa.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
